attributes.action: Stop letting foreign people come to the UK when they cant speak English!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to start this petition as i feel there are far too many foreigners being allowed to set up home in the UK most of which cannot speak English! We are becoming over run & over populated & all british culture is being suffocated! Please sign this petition if you feel as strongly as i do thankyou!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
